model.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small copy of a building, vehicle, machine etc, especially one that can be put together from separate parts
model.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a working model  (=one with parts which move) of a steam engine
They showed us a model of the building.
model.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone whose job is to show clothes, hairstyles etc by wearing them at fashion shows or for photographs
model.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a particular type or design of a vehicle or machine
model.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Renault are introducing three new models at the show.
Our dishwasher is the latest model  (=newest design).
model.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a computer representation or scientific description of something
model.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: Scientists are building computer models of the ocean currents.
model.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: someone or something which people want to copy because they are successful or have good qualities
model.translation[0].definitions[4].exam: He used English medieval architecture as his model.
Good teachers can act as positive role models.
It served as a model for other cities.
model.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: someone who is employed by an artist or photographer to be painted or photographed
model.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to wear clothes at a fashion show or in magazine photographs in order to show them to people
model.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: She’s modeling Donna Karan’s fall collection.
Claire modelled for a few years when she was in her twenties.
model.translation[2].definitions[1].defi: to do a computer representation or scientific description of a situation or event
model.translation[2].definitions[1].exam: They used a computer to model the possible effects of global warming.
model.translation[2].definitions[2].defi: to make something by shaping clay, wood etc
model.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: a particular type or design of a vehicle or machine
model.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: the cheapest model in the Volkswagen range
Our photocopier is the latest model.
model.translation[3].definitions[1].defi: a simple description or structure that is used to help people understand similar systems or structures
model.translation[3].definitions[1].exam: a computer model of the main factors determining a company’s market share
model.translation[3].definitions[2].defi: the way in which something is done by a particular country, person etc that can be copied by others who want similar results
model.translation[3].definitions[2].exam: the American model of airline deregulation
